1. Send voice message with content '...'
2. Check workflow execution
3. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

If applicable, add screenshots or n8n execution logs to help explain your problem.

- n8n version: [e.g. 1.15.0]
- Deployment type: [e.g. Cloud, Self-hosted Docker, NPM]

- Which node is failing: [e.g. Transcribe a recording, HTTP Request]
